name: Not A Drill
description:
A remake of Game & Watch's Fire with its own twists and cats!

Save those falling from a burning building, by bouncing and launching them into the ambulance. Dropping them loses a life, and getting them to safety improves the score. Losing three it’s game over. However, watch out as cats are not the only thing falling from the building...

This game was created in a University 1 Week Game Jam

PC Controls:

• Arrows / AD - Moving

• Esc / P - Pause

• Mouse - Menu interaction

Credits

Producer - Annie Canty 

Designer - Liam Deering 

Artists - Holly Rawlings & Najwa Gutale

Sound Designers - Abdi Yassin, Luis Enriquez & Red Ahmed

Programmers - Lukus Richards & Zak Cronin
